titleStmt.title: Julia M. Craig-McFeely, English Lute Manuscripts and Scribes 1530-1630 (DPhil, University of Oxford, 1993) 1530-1630

revisionDesc.change: Converted to P5 and hand-tidied where necessary

div.head: PDF Download Links
div.p: Please view online at Julia Craig-McFeely's own website

div.head: Abstract
div.p: An examination of the place of the lute in 16th- and 17th-century English Society through a study of the English Lute Manuscripts of the so-called 'Golden Age', including a comprehensive cagtalogue of the sources.

div.head: Table of Contents
div.p: Please go to Julia Craig-McFeely's own website to view her table of contents.
